name: AFTER/AGO
description:
seven years ago, the moon emperor fell in love. seven years after, a fairy knight did.

HINT: click on the butterflise

sengreen and lin xue fall in love. but a confession is a power exchange, and this little interactive game explores how sengreen is empowered by loving lin xue, and how lin xue cannot accept sengreen's love without losing herself. 

-----------

WARNING: this is designed for 1920 x 1080 resolution, and i haven't yet made it responsive, so it's fixed at that resolution. if the text cuts off and you can't see "indomitable," zoom out a bit until you can. sorry for this! this is my first html game, done from scratch, so it's a bit buggy! with the "recommended" scaling on my laptop, i zoomed out to 80%
